featured.text: In the face of this tragedy, food and other supplies from around the world landed in the provincial capital of Kerman on Sunday.
Exciting or challenging events __(39)__ the birth of a child, completion of a major project at work, or moving to a new city generate __(40)__ much stress as does tragedy or disaster.

definition.zh_def: 悲劇；一種以悲傷或不幸結尾的文學或戲劇作品。
definition.en_def: A serious drama or literary work that presents a conflict between a protagonist and a superior force, resulting in a sorrowful or disastrous conclusion.
definition.example: The play is a tragedy that explores the downfall of a once-great hero.
